text.p: Let [mathjaxinline]T: \mathbb R^2 \rightarrow \mathbb R^2[/mathjaxinline] be the transformation that sends all vectors to [mathjaxinline]\mathbf{0}[/mathjaxinline].

font.p: The image of [mathjaxinline]T[/mathjaxinline] is [mathjaxinline]\{ \mathbf{0}\}[/mathjaxinline]. Thus, the image of [mathjaxinline]T[/mathjaxinline] is 0-dimensional. The kernel of [mathjaxinline]T[/mathjaxinline] is the entire domain, so all of [mathjaxinline]\mathbb R^2[/mathjaxinline], which is 2-dimensional.
